Eric Schmidt will assume the role of Executive Chairman.`` I know he( Larry) will merge Google's technology and business vision brilliantly,'' Eric Schmidt said in Google blog post. Larry will be even better! Larry, in my clear opinion, is ready to lead, he continued. As Executive Chairman, Eric Schmidt said he will focus`` wherever I can add the greatest value.'' He will also act as an advisor to Larry and Sergey.
